summary: This is an email chain between attorneys Brittany Henderson and an unnamed recipient, discussing the coordination of interviews for four additional victims of Jeffrey Epstein who are represented by the law firm Edwards Pottinger LLC. The victims are scheduled to attend a victim briefing in New York on October 23, 2019, and the attorneys are attempting to schedule meetings with a prosecutor (likely 'Mandy') for October 23 or 24.

persons.name: Brittany Henderson
persons.context: Attorney from Edwards Pottinger LLC representing additional victims of Jeffrey Epstein, coordinating victim interviews with a prosecutor.

persons.name: Brad Edwards
persons.context: Attorney copied on the email correspondence regarding Epstein victim interviews.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the perpetrator whose victims are being represented and interviewed.

connections.description: Both are attorneys at Edwards Pottinger LLC working on Epstein victim cases.
Henderson is an attorney representing victims of Epstein.

events.title: Victim Briefing in New York
events.description: A victim briefing is scheduled to take place in New York, which four additional Epstein victims will attend.

keyFacts: The law firm Edwards Pottinger LLC represents four additional victims of Jeffrey Epstein who are ready to be interviewed.
These four victims will be present at a victim briefing in New York on October 23, 2019.
Attorneys are attempting to schedule meetings with a prosecutor (likely 'Mandy') for October 23 or 24, 2019, to discuss the victims' experiences.
The correspondence indicates ongoing legal coordination between victim attorneys and prosecutors following Epstein's arrest and death.
